articles.title: New quality talent drives Chinese modernization, report says
articles.summary: 2025 Global Youth Science and Technology Innovation Development Report was unveiled at the Beijing International Youth Innovation and Development Forum, held in parallel with the 2025 Zhongguancun Forum. New quality talent will contribute vigorous strength to advancing Chinese modernization, according to the report.

articles.title: Samsung's latest stick vac can alert you to calls and text messages
articles.author: The Verge
articles.summary: Samaung's new Bespoke AI Jet Ultra cordless stick vacuum has an AI cleaning mode that senses floor types and automatically adjusts suction power and brush speed to suit the user's needs. It's useful in a notification-heavy world where you might just miss the buzz on your phone or ping on your smartwatch.

articles.summary: "This has some suction on it, brilliant. I had a Dyson before, but this machine has far more suction than that. Highly recommend it.   ”’” “”.  ””

articles.title: Dubai could be set for a new, revolutionary feature added to its skyline
articles.author: The National
articles.summary: A start-up has patented a new display medium that could revolutionise the advertising world. The UAE is an important market because the world looks to it for innovation, particularly on an architectural scale, according to the start-ups CEO. The medium could be used to target UAE consumers.

articles.title: 2026 BMW R12 G/S Stokes an Icon's Enduring Spirit
articles.author: Yahoo Daily News
articles.summary: The new BMW R12 G/S takes inspiration from the cars of the 1960s and 1970s. It is the latest model from BMW's R12 range. It costs $12,000 and goes on sale in September.

articles.title: I Spent Some Time With Samsung's AI Appliances. Is the Cost Worth The Hype?
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: AI-powered dishwasher, fridge, oven, washer and vacuum may sound cool, but after comparing the cost to non-AI appliances, it's not sure if you're getting more value from AI-powered appliances than a non- AI appliance.

articles.title: 2026 GMC Sierra EV Gets New Base Model That's $27,500 Cheaper, Plus A Rugged AT4 Trim
articles.author: Yahoo Daily News
articles.summary: GMC introduced a new Standard Range at its event in Las Vegas on Thursday. It's the company's first new range since it was introduced in 2007. It costs $100,000 per item. It is available in standard and premium trim levels. It can be ordered online.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 features we want to see
articles.author: Shacknews
articles.summary: There are some features we think would be dope on the Nintendo Switch 2. From retro libraries to Discord support, here are some of the features we would like to see on the new console. We are looking for features that would be nice on the Switch 2 as well.

articles.author: CTV
articles.summary: Google has revealed its new humanoid robot. It is called Google's new "Hominid".   Â.      in Google's YouTube channel. Google revealed it's new robot is called "Google's new Hominid" and it's humanoid.

articles.title: Nissan unveils all-new 2025 Patrol in the Philippines
articles.author: Manila Bulletin
articles.summary: Nissan Philippines has officially launched the 2025 Nissan Patrol (codenamed Y63). It's the seventh generation of Nissan's flagship luxury SUV. It was first unveiled in Abu Dhabi late last year and is now on its way to the Philippines. It will go on sale later this year.

articles.title: Subscription free eufy doorbell hailed 'better than Ring' amid �50 price slash in Amazon Spring Sale
articles.author: Daily Record
articles.summary: This is the video doorbell without the need for a subscription. It costs £99.99 for a one-way only subscription.   It's available in the UK and Germany. It's not available in North America yet. It will be available soon.

articles.title: BBC Strictly Come Dancing's Janette Manrara and Aljaz Skorjanec say 'it's not easy' in Mother's ...
articles.author: Manchester Evening News
articles.summary: The couple have released the details of their new project. It's a new project they are working on together. It will be a project of their own. It is called 'The New Project' and it's a project for themselves and their partner.

articles.title: Why Canadian brands are going all-in on ‘Elbows Up'
articles.author: Fast Company
articles.summary: Kraft Heinz has a new commercial in Canada celebrating its Canadian workers and highlighting all the Canadian ingredients in its products like peanut butter, cheese, and Kraft Dinner. The commercial is a perfect embodiment of the geopolitical moment between the U.S. and its northern neighbor.
